Package it.polimi.ingsw.config

Class ConfigParser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.config.ConfigParser
public class ConfigParser
extends java.lang.Object
This singleton, when instantiated, reads and stores all configuration variables. Values should be retrieved by getConfiguration().

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.Properties configs  
    private static ConfigParser instance  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private ConfigParser()
    Constructor for the class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static ConfigParser getInstance()
    This method allows to retrieve the instance of ConfigParser, if it exists, otherwise it creates one and returns the newly created instance
    int getIntProperty​(java.lang.String key)
    Reads the value bound to the specified key from the configuration, casting it to an int.
    java.lang.String getProperty​(java.lang.String key)
    Reads the value bound to the specified key from the configuration.
    private void loadConfig​(ConfigFile cfg)
    This method reads a properties configuration file, storing all read variables into configs

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • instance

      private static ConfigParser instance

    • configs

      private java.util.Properties configs

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigParser

      private ConfigParser()
      Constructor for the class. Being a singleton, this class should be instantiated via getInstance().

  • Method Details

    • loadConfig

      private void loadConfig​(ConfigFile cfg)
      This method reads a properties configuration file, storing all read variables into configs
      Parameters:
      cfg - the ConfigFile instance that represents that file that is to be read

    • getProperty

      public java.lang.String getProperty​(java.lang.String key) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Reads the value bound to the specified key from the configuration.
      Parameters:
      key - the name of the property to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the value bound to the property
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified key does not exist

    • getIntProperty

      public int getIntProperty​(java.lang.String key) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Reads the value bound to the specified key from the configuration, casting it to an int.
      Parameters:
      key - the name of the property to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the value bound to the property
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified key does not exist

    • getInstance

      public static ConfigParser getInstance()
      This method allows to retrieve the instance of ConfigParser, if it exists, otherwise it creates one and returns the newly created instance
      Returns:
      the ConfigParser singleton instance
